CustomField.description: Indicates which businesses have territory coverage
CustomField.formula: or( text(Primary_Business__c) = 'Technical Services' ,text(Primary_Business__c) = 'Field Services' ,text(Primary_Business__c) = 'Industrial Services' ,text(Primary_Business__c) = 'Safety-Kleen' ,text(Primary_Business__c) = 'Thermo Fluids' ,text(Primary_Business__c) = 'Performance Plus Products' ,text(Primary_Business__c) = 'Emerald Services' )
CustomField.label: Territory exists for Primary Business
